item.title: InstanceSegment
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: present a simple, fully-convolutional model for real-time instance segmentation that faster than any previous competitive approach. generating a set of prototype masks and predicting per-instance mask coefficients. And produce instance masks by linearly combining the prototypes with the mask coefficients. prototype generation: predicts a set of k prototype masks for the entire image. taking protonet from deeper backbone features produces more robust masks, and higher resolution prototypes result in both
